author: Zoe Jewell
title: 16 Best Celebrity Proposal Stories Ever (PHOTOS)
text:
Pink and Carey Hart 
Who says the guy always has to propose? 
The “Try” singer took matters into her own hands and held up a sign that said “Will you marry me?” while standing on the sidelines during his motocross race. He said “yes,” of course! Pink and Carey Hart Advertisement 
Who says the guy always has to propose? 
The “Try” singer took matters into her own hands and held up a sign that said “Will you marry me?” while standing on the sidelines during his motocross race. He said “yes,” of course! Seth Rogen and Lauren Miller 
Yep, it’s true — the Superbad star asked his wife to marry him while she was topless. 
“She was in our closet, changing, and she was literally only in her underpants. I had already kind of started [to propose]. I didn’t picture it like this, and I know she didn’t picture it like this,” he told Conan O’Brien. Seth Rogen and Lauren Miller Advertisement 
Yep, it’s true — the Superbad star asked his wife to marry him while she was topless. 
“She was in our closet, changing, and she was literally only in her underpants. I had already kind of started [to propose]. I didn’t picture it like this, and I know she didn’t picture it like this,” he told Conan O’Brien. Kate Middleton and Prince William Pure, royal bliss. While on vacation in Kenya, Prince William asked Kate to marry him with his late mother Princess Diana’s gorgeous sapphire ring. Kate Middleton and Prince William Advertisement 
Pure, royal bliss. While on vacation in Kenya, Prince William asked Kate to marry him with his late mother Princess Diana’s gorgeous sapphire ring. Joe Manganiello and Sofia Vergara 
Hey, at least he tried! The Magic Mike star attempted to propose to the Modern Family actress in Spanish. 
"I had a big speech in Spanish, and that's what I was nervous about," he said on Live! with Kelly. 
"The last thing you want to do is like mess up the Spanish on the proposal to a Colombian woman.” Joe Manganiello and Sofia Vergara Advertisement 
Hey, at least he tried! The Magic Mike star attempted to propose to the Modern Family actress in Spanish. 
"I had a big speech in Spanish, and that's what I was nervous about," he said on Live! with Kelly. 
"The last thing you want to do is like mess up the Spanish on the proposal to a Colombian woman.” Ludacris and Eudoxie Mbouguiengue 
The rapper asked his lady to marry him while the pair were on a plane to Costa Rica. 
“I had written in the grass her name and ‘Will you marry me?'" he told Ellen DeGeneres. 
"So once she saw it and we looped around, of course she burst out into tears and was just extremely happy. So it was a pretty original idea." Ludacris and Eudoxie Mbouguiengue Advertisement 
The rapper asked his lady to marry him while the pair were on a plane to Costa Rica. 
“I had written in the grass her name and ‘Will you marry me?'" he told Ellen DeGeneres. 
"So once she saw it and we looped around, of course she burst out into tears and was just extremely happy. So it was a pretty original idea." Matthew McConaughey and Camila Alves 
He made her work for it! The Dallas Buyers Club star wrapped his wife’s engagement ring in eight different boxes. 
"The first words out of her mouth were not yes. I’m not gonna say what it was,” he told Jay Leno. 
“But I did say, ‘Look, I’m down on a knee. I’ll stay here awhile. I will outlast you.’ And I did! She conceded." Matthew McConaughey and Camila Alves Advertisement 
He made her work for it! The Dallas Buyers Club star wrapped his wife’s engagement ring in eight different boxes. 
"The first words out of her mouth were not yes. I’m not gonna say what it was,” he told Jay Leno. 
“But I did say, ‘Look, I’m down on a knee. I’ll stay here awhile. I will outlast you.’ And I did! She conceded." Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy 
We’d expect nothing less from this dancing couple. 
The ballroom hunk popped the question to Peta on stage in front of thousands of people! Thankfully, she said yes. Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy Advertisement 
We’d expect nothing less from this dancing couple. 
The ballroom hunk popped the question to Peta on stage in front of thousands of people! Thankfully, she said yes. Ellen DeGeneres and Portia de Rossi 
This is the cutest story ever, so we’ll just let Portia explain. 
"We were watching the fish and she said, 'This is a pretty romantic moment, right?' And I said, 'Every moment with you is romantic,'" she told People . "And then she gave me the ring." 
So simple, but so perfect! Ellen DeGeneres and Portia de Rossi Advertisement 
This is the cutest story ever, so we’ll just let Portia explain. 
"We were watching the fish and she said, 'This is a pretty romantic moment, right?' And I said, 'Every moment with you is romantic,'" she told People . "And then she gave me the ring." 
So simple, but so perfect! Taylor Kinney and Lady Gaga It didn’t last forever, but the Chicago Fire star asked Lady Gaga to marry him on Valentine’s Day in New York... while it was snowing! Winter wonderland, indeed. Taylor Kinney and Lady Gaga Advertisement 
It didn’t last forever, but the Chicago Fire star asked Lady Gaga to marry him on Valentine’s Day in New York... while it was snowing! Winter wonderland, indeed. George and Amal Clooney 
George went for the simple approach when proposing to Amal. The actor planned a romantic dinner at home and played his aunt’s song “Why Shouldn’t I” while he got down on one knee. 
"I got down on my knee and said, 'I couldn’t imagine spending the rest of my life without you.' And she kept looking at the ring, and she was looking at me, and she was like, 'Oh, my God,'" he told Ellen DeGeneres in February 2016. 
"And we now know, because there was a playlist, how long it actually took, and it was, like, 25 minutes." George and Amal Clooney Advertisement 
George went for the simple approach when proposing to Amal. The actor planned a romantic dinner at home and played his aunt’s song “Why Shouldn’t I” while he got down on one knee. 
"I got down on my knee and said, 'I couldn’t imagine spending the rest of my life without you.' And she kept looking at the ring, and she was looking at me, and she was like, 'Oh, my God,'" he told Ellen DeGeneres in February 2016. 
"And we now know, because there was a playlist, how long it actually took, and it was, like, 25 minutes." Nick Cannon and Mariah Carey 
Nick proposed to Mimi not once, but twice. 
The first time around he asked on top of her Manhattan apartment with a candy Ring Pop. He redeemed himself a few days later and officially popped the question on a helicopter ride. Nick Cannon and Mariah Carey Advertisement 
Nick proposed to Mimi not once, but twice. 
The first time around he asked on top of her Manhattan apartment with a candy Ring Pop. He redeemed himself a few days later and officially popped the question on a helicopter ride. Russell Brand and Katy Perry 
The funny guy asked the “Teenage Dream” songstress to marry him on top of an elephant in India. 
Oh, and did we mention there was a New Year’s fireworks celebration happening at the same time?! Russell Brand and Katy Perry Advertisement 
The funny guy asked the “Teenage Dream” songstress to marry him on top of an elephant in India. 
Oh, and did we mention there was a New Year’s fireworks celebration happening at the same time?! Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Christmas proposals can be complicated, but the La La Land star surprised Chrissy with a gorgeous ring while they were vacationing in the Maldives. Gorgeous! Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Advertisement 
Christmas proposals can be complicated, but the La La Land star surprised Chrissy with a gorgeous ring while they were vacationing in the Maldives. Gorgeous! Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade The NBA player got his two boys, Zaire and Zion, to hold up a sign that read “Will you marry us?” How cute! Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade Advertisement 
The NBA player got his two boys, Zaire and Zion, to hold up a sign that read “Will you marry us?” How cute! Heidi Klum and Seal 
This story doesn’t surprise us in the least. Though their marriage didn’t last, the singer proposed to the German model inside a giant igloo!"There was food and champagne, and then the helicopter left. It was a little scary, too, because you're so cut off from the world. No trees, nothing — it was hardcore. But I was ecstatic,” the Project Runway star shared. Heidi Klum and Seal Advertisement 
This story doesn’t surprise us in the least. Though their marriage didn’t last, the singer proposed to the German model inside a giant igloo!"There was food and champagne, and then the helicopter left. It was a little scary, too, because you're so cut off from the world. No trees, nothing — it was hardcore. But I was ecstatic,” the Project Runway star shared. Kim Kardashian and Kanye West 
We’re going to let you finish, but these two probably have the best engagement story of all time. 
The rapper rented out the AT&T Park in San Francisco, home of the Giants, and popped the question in front of all her family and friends. 
#GOALS Kim Kardashian and Kanye West Advertisement
